verses.roman:
tomāra darśane sarva jagatera sthiti
tumi nā dekhile kāro nāhi sthiti gati

synonyms: tomāra—Your; darśane—by the seeing; sarva—all; jagatera—of the universe; sthiti—maintenance; tumi—You; nā dekhile—in not seeing; kāro—of anyone; nāhi—there is not; sthiti—staying; gati—moving.
translation: "All the worlds exist because You oversee them. None can live, move or have their being without Your supervision.
